services.name: British Army Basic Training
services.description: This course provides fundamental military skills, discipline, and leadership training essential for every soldier in the British Army.

services.name: Indian Army Officer Training
services.description: A comprehensive program designed to equip future officers of the Indian Army with the necessary tactical, technical, and physical skills.

services.name: Combat Fitness Training
services.description: Focused on enhancing the physical capabilities of soldiers to meet the demanding nature of military operations.

services.name: Advanced Infantry Tactics
services.description: Advanced training for infantry soldiers, focusing on high-level tactics, survival skills, and modern warfare technology.

services.name: Parachute Training
services.description: Specialized training for airborne operations, including jump procedures, aerial navigation, and landing techniques.

services.name: Jungle Warfare Course
services.description: This course trains soldiers to operate and survive in jungle environments, emphasizing guerrilla tactics and survival skills.

services.name: Mountain Warfare Training
services.description: Prepares troops for combat in mountainous and high-altitude areas, focusing on mobility, survival, and combat skills.

services.name: Desert Warfare Training
services.description: Equips soldiers with the skills needed to operate effectively in desert environments, including navigation and vehicle operation under extreme conditions.

services.name: Cyber Defense Course
services.description: A specialized course designed to train personnel in cyber security, focusing on protecting military networks and conducting cyber operations.

services.name: Sniper Training Program
services.description: Trains selected soldiers in long-range target engagement, reconnaissance, and survival skills in various environments.

services.name: Naval Special Operations Training
services.description: Training for specialized naval operations, including underwater demolition, amphibious assault, and boarding operations.
